Title: FUNC-01: Completed Task Exception Visibility
COS Reference/Expected Results: Task exception visibility under Certificate Dependencies

Step Action: Create a certificate with a dependent task sss
Mark the completed task as an exception

Step Expected: Exception count is accurate; marked task appears in Task Exceptions list

Title: FUNC-02: Certificate Completion with Exceptions
COS Reference/Expected Results: Certificate completion and exception count accuracy

Step Action: Complete a certificate with a task marked as an exception
Verify the exception count in the Dependencies tab
Step Expected: Exception count reflects the task marked as an exception
Task marked as an exception appears in the list

Title: VAL-01: Task Exception Validation
COS Reference/Expected Results: Task exception validation on certificate completion

Step Action: Complete a certificate with a task not marked as an exception
Verify the exception count in the Dependencies tab

Step Expected: Task not marked as an exception does not appear in the list

Title: NEG-01: No Task Exceptions
COS Reference/Expected Results: No task exceptions handling in Certificate Dependencies

Step Action: Create a certificate with no tasks marked as exceptions

Step Expected: Exception count is zero; no tasks in Task Exceptions list

Step Action: Create a certificate with a task having an invalid exception status
Step Expected: Certificate creation fails or task status is corrected

Step Action: Verify the task status and exception count
Step Expected: Task status is corrected or exception count ignores invalid status

Title: REG-01: Existing Certificate Completion Flow
COS Reference/Expected Results: Existing certificate completion flow remains unchanged

Step Action: Complete a certificate without task exceptions
Step Expected: Certificate completion flow behaves as before

Step Action: Verify the certificate status and dependencies
Step Expected: Certificate status and dependencies are accurate

Title: REG-02: Task Exception List Behavior
COS Reference/Expected Results: Task exception list behaves as expected

Step Action: Open the Task Exceptions list for a completed certificate
Step Expected: Task exception list displays tasks marked as exceptions

Step Action: Verify the tasks in the list
Step Expected: Tasks marked as exceptions appear in the list
